body.p: In which scenario do the data have a larger F test statistic?

multiple_choice.choice: Both scenarios have the same F test statistic.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Recall that in scenario 1 we have a larger within group variability. In other words, in scenario 1 the denominator of the F test statistic is larger. Recall also that in both scenarios the numerator of the F test statistic is roughly equal (since the sample means in both scenarios are very similar).
